Header: Flu outbreak forces university closure in Peradeniya
Content: The University of Peradeniya has been closed temporarily as a result of a fever spreading in the area. Vice Chancellor of the University Upul Dissanayake said the administration urges all students to vacate the university premises before 12 noon on Tuesday,Â April 04. The Vice Chancellor further noted that the decision was taken to temporarily suspend all academic activities after more than 500 students visited the University Medical Centre to receive treatment today, April 03.
